context.note: Contact your local distributor or call the parts department phone number on the back cover of this manual to order a new cleanout gasket. Have the new gasket available before removing the cleanout cover.
context.p: The cleanout opening is shown in . To remove lime scale manually through the cleanout opening, proceed as follows:

step.cmd: Turn the Enable/Disable switch located on the front of the heater to the Disabled position.
Turn off the electrical supply to the water heater.
The water heater must be drained. See . Follow the instructions on how to drain the water heater.
Remove the outer cleanout-access panel from lower side of the water-heater jacket.
Remove the cleanout cover from cleanout opening.
Remove lime, scale, and/or sediment using care not to damage the glass lining.
Install a new cleanout gasket if required.
Reinstall the cleanout cover. Be sure to draw the plate up tight by tightening the screws securely.
Turn on the electrical supply to place the water heater back in operation. See .
Allow the water heater to complete several heating cycles to ensure it is operating properly.
